Illustration of the onset of spin polarization in the narrow portion of a QPC in the presence of LSOC when a finite bias is applied between the two SGs. The full and dashed lines represent the potential energy profile U(0,y) in the middle portion of the QPC in the presence of a symmetric and asymmetric bias between the two SGs, respectively.
